text: Ezɨ Judan mɨdorozir gumaziba ghua gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn itir tauan mamɨn oto, kar tauan mɨdorozir gumaziba ikia apaniba bagha garim. Egha me apaniba bagha garava avenge. Me apanibar kuabar garima, da pura tintinibar nguazimɨn irav iti, ezɨ me dɨgavir kuram gami. Men tav angamɨra itir puvatɨ, me bar moghɨra ariaghire.
